analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/39/0xfa3859ec80c591804a75ac7859a5099531f4f8da.sol:
	Contract DappToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/39/0xfa3859ec80c591804a75ac7859a5099531f4f8da.sol#243-244)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Reentrancy in DappTokenSale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/39/0xfa3859ec80c591804a75ac7859a5099531f4f8da.sol#21-31):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(tokenContract.balanceOf(this) >= _numberOfTokens) (/unique_chucks/39/0xfa3859ec80c591804a75ac7859a5099531f4f8da.sol#23-24)
	- require(bool)(tokenContract.transfer(msg.sender,_numberOfTokens)) (/unique_chucks/39/0xfa3859ec80c591804a75ac7859a5099531f4f8da.sol#24-26)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokensSold (/unique_chucks/39/0xfa3859ec80c591804a75ac7859a5099531f4f8da.sol#26-28)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/39/0xfa3859ec80c591804a75ac7859a5099531f4f8da.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.2 (/unique_chucks/39/0xfa3859ec80c591804a75ac7859a5099531f4f8da.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_tokenContract' of DappTokenSale.DappTokenSale (/unique_chucks/39/0xfa3859ec80c591804a75ac7859a5099531f4f8da.sol#11) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_tokenPrice' of DappTokenSale.DappTokenSale (/unique_chucks/39/0xfa3859ec80c591804a75ac7859a5099531f4f8da.sol#11) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_numberOfTokens' of DappTokenSale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/39/0xfa3859ec80c591804a75ac7859a5099531f4f8da.sol#21-22) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/39/0xfa3859ec80c591804a75ac7859a5099531f4f8da.sol#113-114) is not in mixedCase
